Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.managers.SoundManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObserver
public class SoundManager extends Object implements GameObserver
Manages the audio subsystem, handling background music playback and sound effects.

Design Pattern: Observer
This class implements GameObserver, allowing it to react autonomously to game events (like line clears or game over) triggered by the GameController. This decouples the game logic from the specific audio implementation.

It handles resource loading safely and manages global audio states like muting and playback speed adjustments during high-intensity moments.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundManager

      public SoundManager()
      Constructs the SoundManager and loads all audio assets.

      Paths and volumes are retrieved from GameConfiguration. Resources are loaded with error handling to ensure the game can continue silently if an audio file is missing.

  • Method Details

    • loadMediaPlayer

      private javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer loadMediaPlayer(String path, double volume)
      Helper method to safely load a background music file.
      Parameters:
      path - relative path to the resource
      volume - initial volume level (0.0 to 1.0)
      Returns:
      a configured MediaPlayer, or null if loading failed

    • loadAudioClip

      private javafx.scene.media.AudioClip loadAudioClip(String path)
      Helper method to safely load short sound effects.
      Parameters:
      path - relative path to the resource
      Returns:
      a loaded AudioClip, or null if loading failed

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic()
      Starts background music playback if not muted.

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()
      Stops the background music.

    • toggleMute

      public void toggleMute()
      Toggles the mute state for all audio. Pauses background music immediately if muted, or resumes it if unmuted.

    • onLineCleared

      public void onLineCleared(int lines, String message)
      plays a sound effect when lines are cleared. Selects a special "Tetris" sound if 4 lines are cleared at once.
      Specified by:
      onLineCleared in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      lines - number of lines cleared
      message - notification message (unused here)

    • onBrickDropped

      public void onBrickDropped()
      Plays a landing sound when a brick hits the stack.

      Debouncing Logic: Uses lastDropTime to enforce a cooldown defined by GameConfiguration.DROP_SOUND_COOLDOWN_MS. This prevents audio distortion when bricks land in rapid succession (e.g., during hard drops or high speeds).

      Specified by:
      onBrickDropped in interface GameObserver

    • onGameOver

      public void onGameOver()
      Stops music and plays the Game Over sound effect.
      Specified by:
      onGameOver in interface GameObserver

    • setDangerMode

      public void setDangerMode(boolean isDanger)
      Adjusts the background music speed to reflect the game's tension.
      Parameters:
      isDanger - true to increase playback rate; false to reset to normal speed.

    • onDangerStateChanged

      public void onDangerStateChanged(boolean isDanger)
      Description copied from interface: GameObserver
      Triggered when the "Danger" state changes.

      The game enters a danger state when the stack reaches a critical height. Observers can use this to play intense music or shake the screen.

      Specified by:
      onDangerStateChanged in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      isDanger - true if the game is in a critical state; false otherwise.

    • onBoardUpdated

      public void onBoardUpdated(ViewData viewData)
      Description copied from interface: GameObserver
      Triggered when the active falling brick moves, rotates, or spawns.

      Used by the View to redraw the dynamic elements of the board (active piece, ghost piece).

      Specified by:
      onBoardUpdated in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      viewData - a snapshot containing the current piece coordinates and shape.

    • onGameBackgroundUpdated

      public void onGameBackgroundUpdated(int[][] boardMatrix)
      Description copied from interface: GameObserver
      Triggered when the static background grid changes (e.g., when a piece locks or rows are cleared).

      Used by the View to repaint the locked blocks on the grid.

      Specified by:
      onGameBackgroundUpdated in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the 2D array representing the color codes of locked blocks.

    • onScoreUpdated

      public void onScoreUpdated(int score)
      Description copied from interface: GameObserver
      Triggered when the player's score increases.
      Specified by:
      onScoreUpdated in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      score - the new total score.

    • onLevelUpdated

      public void onLevelUpdated(int level)
      Description copied from interface: GameObserver
      Triggered when the player advances to a new level. This usually implies an increase in game speed.
      Specified by:
      onLevelUpdated in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      level - the new level number.
